title: AZViewer
description: A widget to display documents (Case documents or work item documents)

events.title: Open document
events.description: Open the document that is contained in the event payload in the Viewer widget.

events.title: Send case information
events.description: Save the case ID in the cache and close currently viewed documents to prepare for opening documents from another case.

events.title: Select case
events.description: Display the case information for the case that is contained in the event payload.

events.title: Receive work item
events.description: Display the work item that is contained in the event payload.

events.title: Clear content
events.description: Clear the content of Viewer widget and the cached identifiers, and then close all tabs.
